serviceData.title: Comprehensive Roofing Solutions in Kansas City, MO
serviceData.p: KC Construction Roofing delivers licensed, insured roofing services for homeowners and businesses throughout Kansas City. From emergency repairs after storms to complete roof replacements and preventative maintenance, our certified crews use high-quality materials and industry best practices to protect your property and improve curb appeal.

lists.title: Asphalt Shingle Roof Replacement
lists.shortDescription: Cost-effective residential roof replacement using high-quality architectural shingles with professional ventilation and flashing installation.
lists.description:
• Typical Lifespan: 20–30 years for architectural shingles

  • Benefits:

    • Wide range of colors and styles to enhance curb appeal

    • Cost-effective option for most homes with reliable weather performance

    • Proper ventilation and underlayment installed to extend roof life
lists.h2: What Is an Asphalt Shingle Roof Replacement in Kansas City, MO
lists.p2: An asphalt shingle roof replacement replaces worn or storm-damaged shingles, installs new underlayment and flashing, and corrects ventilation issues. KC Construction Roofing performs a full inspection, removes the existing roofing materials (when required), repairs or replaces decking if needed, and installs high-quality architectural or laminated shingles to protect your home for decades. Call [phone] to schedule a no-obligation estimate.
lists.tyesHeading: When Do You Need a Roof Replacement?
lists.overViewHeading: Overview Of Asphalt Shingle Roof Replacement
lists.overViewContent:
What's Included:

  • Full roof tear-off (if selected) or overlay options

  • New underlayment, ice & water shield in critical areas

  • New flashing at chimneys, valleys, and penetrations

  • Starter strip, ridge caps, and proper ventilation

  • Job-site cleanup and disposal of old materials

Typical Project Details:
Average single-family home: 1,500–3,000 sq ft roof area
Materials & labor warranty options available

leftSection.title: Residential Roofing
leftSection.description: Specializing in asphalt shingle replacements for Kansas City homes, improving energy efficiency and resale value.

rightSection.title: How to Choose the Right Shingle
rightSection.description: Consider durability (wind and hail rating), color and style, warranty length, and energy-reflective options. Our team helps you compare brands like GAF, Owens Corning, and CertainTeed.

allowedItems: Shingle tear-off or overlay per permit and local code
New underlayment and ice & water shield in valleys/edges
Replacement of damaged roof decking (quoted separately)
Installation of new flashing and ventilation components
Full cleanup and disposal of old roofing materials
prohibitedItems: Structural framing replacement beyond minor decking repairs
Interior repairs for water damage (unless contracted)
Permit fees in some municipalities (may be additional)
lists.idealHeading: Ideal Projects for Asphalt Shingle Replacement:
idealProjects: Aging roofs showing widespread granule loss or curling
Post-storm replacement after wind or hail damage
Preparing a property for sale to maximize value
Replacing roofs with inadequate ventilation or leaks
